title: Which Trello Plan Is Best for You? Our Pricing Guide Can Help
content: Trello offers a tiered pricing structure that includes a free plan and three paid options: Standard, Premium, and Enterprise. The Free Plan is suitable for individuals or small teams, offering unlimited cards, up to 10 boards per Workspace, unlimited Power-Ups, and 10 MB/file storage. The Standard Plan, priced at $5 per user per month (billed annually), includes unlimited boards, advanced checklists, custom fields, and guest access. The Premium Plan, at $10 per user per month (billed annually), adds features like additional views (Timeline, Calendar, Dashboard, Table, Map), unlimited automation runs, and enhanced admin controls. The Enterprise Plan, starting at $17.50 per user per month, is for larger organizations, offering higher security standards, organization-wide permissions, and SSO. Trello also provides discounts for non-profit organizations, students, and teachers.
